Saturday:

How to Find Us!

1980-A Ashley River Road Charleston, SC 29407
766-6490 
CARRYOUT ORDERS CAN ONLY BE PLACE INSIDE THE RESTAURANT.

Online or phone ordering is not available.

Saturday carryout available after 3 p.m.

Welcome to Bear-E-Patch Cafe! We pride ourselves on providing our customers with a unique and pleasurable dining experience. We welcome your visit to our website and appreciate your interest in our services. If you have any questions feel free to contact us.

We care about the good taste of our food as well as providing our customers with personal, hospitable service. We are proud to be part of this beautiful community and hope to always make your time with us enjoyable.

Our mission is simple: to serve you the best food and drink possible at a comfortable price. So come on by and relax, we are here to serve you, family and your friends.

Hawes Family
